title: Fact Check: Video of migrant workers protest from Hyderabad is being shared as Gujarat | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
Amidst the ongoing migrant crisis, a video of a protest is being circulated on social media with a claim that it is from Gujarat.

NewsMobile fact-checked the video and found that the claim is misleading.

We closely examined the video and noticed that ‘Hyderabad City Police’ was written on the protective vests of the policemen.

We then put the keyframes of the video through Reverse Image Search along with the relevant keywords and found the same video in a news bulletin by Siasat Daily uploaded on May 3, 2020.

As per the video description, the video is from Tolichowki in Hyderabad, Telangana.

Sakshi TV also uploaded the same video with the title, “Migrant Workers Protest In Tolichowki Over To Send Back To Their HomeTowns.”

Thus, from the above information, we can conclude that the video is from Hyderabad and not Gujarat. Hence, the claim is false.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
